elements.name: As a User I want to Login to my Account so that I can Enter the Planetarium

steps.name: The User is on the Login Page
Account with username "Batman" and password "I am the night" already registered
The User enters "Batman" into username input bar
The User enters "I am the night" into password input bar
The User clicks on the Login Button
The User is redirected to the Planetarium

elements.name: As the System I don't want a user to Login to an Account using an invalid Username and Password combo so that I can ensure my user accounts are secure

steps.name: The User is on the Login Page
Account with username "Lisan" and password "al-gaib" already registered
The User enters "Lisan" into username input bar
The User enters "atreidies" into password input bar
The User clicks on the Login Button
The User is kept at the login page

elements.name: As the System I don't want a user to Login to an Account using an invalid Username and Password combo so that I can ensure my user accounts are secure

steps.name: The User is on the Login Page
Account with username "Lisan" and password "al-gaib" already registered
The User enters "Paul" into username input bar
The User enters "al-gaib" into password input bar
The User clicks on the Login Button
The User is kept at the login page

elements.name: As a User I want to Logout of my Account so that I can exit the Planetarium

steps.name: The User is on the Login Page
Account with username "Batman" and password "I am the night" already registered
The User enters "Batman" into username input bar
The User enters "I am the night" into password input bar
The User clicks on the Login Button
The User is redirected to the Planetarium
The User clicks on the Logout Button
The User is redirected back to the Login page

elements.name: As a User I want to Register an Account with the Planetarium so that I can Login Securely

steps.name: The User is on the Login Page
No Registered User with username "Paul muad'dib atreides!!!!!!!!"
The User clicks on Create an Account Button
The User enters "Paul muad'dib atreides!!!!!!!!" into registration username input bar
The User enters "Air power sea power desert30!!" into registration password input bar
The User clicks on the Create Button
The User is registered and redirected into the Planetarium Login page

elements.name: As the System I don't want a user to Register an Account using invalid usernames and passwords so that I can ensure system requirements are met

steps.name: The User is on the Login Page
Account with username "Lisan" and password "al-gaib" already registered
The User clicks on Create an Account Button
The User enters "Lisan" into registration username input bar
The User enters "atreidies" into registration password input bar
The User clicks on the Create Button
The User is kept at the Registration page
